main event: A cab driver observed a bright object in the sky to the south of Baltimore, Maryland on November 7, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately half the distance between the horizon., The object maintained a constant speed and direction., It was described as not blinking and moving faster than ordinary aircraft., An investigation request was made to the control tower, confirming no aircraft were in the air at that time., The sighting was reported to NASA and referenced in records of previous sodium/chemical shots from Wallops Island.
sighted object: a bright, non-blinking object in the sky
witness description: a cab driver and a night operator for the Electrical Boat Co. in Middle River
